title: Further Evidence that Renal Oncocytoma has Malignant Potential
abstract: No AccessJournal of Urology1 Mar 1988Further Evidence that Renal Oncocytoma has Malignant Potential Kostantinos E. Psihramis, Paola Dal Cin, Stephen P. Dretler, George R. Prout, and Avery A. Sandberg Kostantinos E. PsihramisKostantinos E. Psihramis Current address: University of Toronto, Mount Sinai Hospital, 600 University Ave., Toronto, Ontario, Canada M5G 1X5. More articles by this author , Paola Dal CinPaola Dal Cin More articles by this author , Stephen P. DretlerStephen P. Dretler More articles by this author , George R. ProutGeorge R. Sandberg More articles by this author View All Author Informationhttps://doi.org/10.1016/S0022-5347(17)42535-3AboutPDF ToolsAdd to favoritesDownload CitationsTrack CitationsPermissionsReprints ShareFacebookLinked InTwitterEmail We report a case of bilateral renal oncocytoma. The right tumor infiltrated the renal capsule focally, and the left tumor penetrated through the capsule into the surrounding perinephric fat and extended into the left renal vein. Karyotyping of the left oncocytoma showed loss of chromosomes 1 and Y (—1,—Y). These karyotypic anomalies, along with the capsular, perinephric fat and renal vein involvement, indicate that renal oncocytomas, despite similar gross and microscopic pathological characteristics, are a heterogeneous group of tumors, some of which have malignant (local invasiveness) potential. © 1988 by The American Urological Association Education and Research, Inc.FiguresReferencesRelatedDetailsCited ByZAMBRANO N, LUBENSKY I, MERINO M, LINEHAN W and WALTHER M (2018) HISTOPATHOLOGY AND MOLECULAR GENETICS OF RENAL TUMORS: TOWARD UNIFICATION OF A CLASSIFICATION SYSTEMJournal of Urology, VOL. 162, NO. 4, (1246-1258), Online publication date: 1-Oct-1999.WEIRICH G, GLENN G, JUNKER K, MERINO M, STORKEL S, LUBENSKY I, CHOYKE P, PACK S, AMIN M, WALTHER M, LINEHAN W and ZBAR B (2018) FAMILIAL RENAL ONCOCYTOMA: CLINICOPATHOLOGICAL STUDY OF 5 FAMILIESJournal of Urology, VOL. 160, NO. 2, (335-340), Online publication date: 1-Aug-1998.Füzesi L, Gunawan B, Braun S and Boeckmann W (2018) Renal Oncocytoma with a Translocation t(9;11)(p23;q13)Journal of Urology, VOL. 152, NO. 2 Part 1, (471-472), Online publication date: 1-Aug-1994.Morra M and Das S (2018) Renal Oncocytoma: A Review of Histogenesis, Histopathology, Diagnosis and TreatmentJournal of Urology, VOL. 150, NO. 2 Part 1, (295-302), Online publication date: 1-Aug-1993.Kadesky K and Fulgham P (2018) Bilateral Multifocal Renal Oncocytoma: Case Report and Review of the LiteratureJournal of Urology, VOL. 150, NO. 4, (1227-1228), Online publication date: 1-Oct-1993.Meloni A, Bridge J and Sandberg A (2018) Reviews on Chromosome Studies in Urological Tumors I.
